thread.title: Thinking creatively about treating cancer in Western Australia
thread.title_full: Thinking creatively about treating cancer in Western Australia

title: Thinking creatively about treating cancer in Western Australia
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Thinking creatively about treating ca... Thinking creatively about treating cancer in Western Australia Next Story Prev Story 3 hrs ago Read more: The Age 
As users label WA's biggest cancer treatment centre "painful" and "chaotic", a chemotherapy-at-home business and a university researcher have suggested the government think more creatively about cancer. This week a man reported his experience of hours spent at Sir Charles Gairdner Hospital's Cancer Centre with his terminally ill wife as "painful" , saying while staff were caring and competent, they were under excessive pressure. Start the conversation, or Read more at The Age.
